mil5.5.3:1.2: ‘ahamasmi, bhikkhave, brahmano yacayogo sada payatapani antimadehadharo anuttaro bhisakko sallakatto’ti.
mil5.5.3:1.4: ‘etadaggam, bhikkhave, mama savakanam bhikkhunam appabadhanam yadidam bakulo’ti.
mil5.5.3:1.5: Bhagavato ca sarire bahukkhattum abadho uppanno dissati.
mil5.5.3:1.6: Yadi, bhante nagasena, tathagato anuttaro, tena hi ‘etadaggam …pe…
mil5.5.3:1.8: Yadi thero bakulo appabadhanam aggo, tena hi ‘ahamasmi …pe…
mil5.5.3:1.10: Ayampi ubhato kotiko panho tavanuppatto, so taya nibbahitabbo”ti.
mil5.5.3:2.5: bakulo’ti, tanca pana bahiranam agamanam adhigamanam pariyattinam attani vijjamanatam sandhaya bhasitam.
mil5.5.3:3.1: Santi kho pana, maharaja, bhagavato savaka thanacankamika, te thanena cankamena divarattim vitinamenti, bhagava pana, maharaja, thanena cankamena nisajjaya sayanena divarattim vitinameti, ye te, maharaja, bhikkhu thanacankamika, te tena angena atireka.
mil5.5.3:4.1: Santi kho pana, maharaja, bhagavato savaka ekasanika, te jivitahetupi dutiyam bhojanam na bhunjanti, bhagava pana, maharaja, dutiyampi yava tatiyampi bhojanam bhunjati, ye te, maharaja, bhikkhu ekasanika, te tena angena atireka, anekavidhani, maharaja, tani karanani tesam tesam tam tam sandhaya bhanitani.
mil5.5.3:4.2: Bhagava pana, maharaja, anuttaro silena samadhina pannaya vimuttiya vimuttinanadassanena dasahi ca balehi catuhi vesarajjehi attharasahi buddhadhammehi chahi asadharanehi nanehi, kevale ca buddhavisaye tam sandhaya bhanitam—
mil5.5.3:5.1: Idha, maharaja, manussesu eko jatima hoti, eko dhanava, eko vijjava, eko sippava, eko suro, eko vicakkhano, sabbepete abhibhaviya rajayeva tesam uttamo hoti;
mil5.5.3:5.2: evameva kho, maharaja, bhagava sabbasattanam aggo jettho settho.
mil5.5.3:6.1: Yam pana ayasma bakulo appabadho ahosi, tam abhiniharavasena, so hi, maharaja, anomadassissa bhagavato udaravatabadhe uppanne vipassissa ca bhagavato atthasatthiya ca bhikkhusatasahassanam tinapupphakaroge uppanne sayam tapaso samano nanabhesajjehi tam byadhim apanetva appabadhatam patto, bhanito ca ‘etadaggam …pe…
mil5.5.3:7.1: Bhagavato, maharaja, byadhimhi uppajjantepi anuppajjantepi dhutangam adiyantepi anadiyantepi natthi bhagavata sadiso koci satto.
mil5.5.3:8.1: ‘Yavata, bhikkhave, satta apada va dvipada va catuppada va bahuppada va rupino va arupino va sannino va asannino va nevasanninasannino va, tathagato tesam aggamakkhayati araham sammasambuddho’”ti.
